price: እነዚያ ያመኑና መልካም ሥራዎችንም የሠሩ ለእነርሱ ከሥሮቻቸው ወንዞች የሚፈሱባቸው ገነቶች አሏቸው፡፡ ይህ ታላቅ ማግኘት ነው፡፡
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātun tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru dhālika al-fawzu al-kabīru
